title: Installation issue: hdf5
body:
Note I have having this issue inside of Docker containers. I am not sure if this is part of the issue or not. I am able to successfully `spack install hdf5` on MacOS with no trouble.

Additional files including `config.log` are attached.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install hdf5

```

### Platform and user environment
I tried the HDF5 spack install in two different Docker containers:

CentOS 7.6 Docker Container:
```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux 0600f3ef42c6 4.9.93-linuxkit-aufs #1 SMP Wed Jun 6 16:55:56 UTC 2018 x86_64 
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core) 
``` 
CentOS 7.6 Compiler
```yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: centos7
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
    target: x86_64
```

Ubuntu 18.04 Docker Container:
```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux 3d68f91c0bae 4.9.93-linuxkit-aufs #1 SMP Wed Jun 6 16:55:56 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
``` 
Ubuntu 18.04 Compiler
```yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@7.3.0
    target: x86_64
```
### Additional information
Additional information given was taken from CentOS 7.6 container with gcc-4.8.5.
